This is a beautiful dress, but the fit wasn't for me. I'm 5'1", and the waistband sat in an odd place above my natural waist, and traveled up. There's a LOT of extra material in the top front, which might work for someone significantly bustier, or someone wearing an edwardian corset. Even with a wide belt to create a new waistline it looked less rustic and more like I was wearing a sack. It actually looked better backwards!

Something is off with the cut of the torso. It's so short that when you move your arms, the waistband pops up to the ribs, making it an empire waist. This happens in part because the fabric isn't stretchy. Overall just looks frumpy.

I loved the fabric of the dress.  It flows, breathes, and is comfortable to wear for long periods.  It fit true to size.  My only complaint was the placement of the slit.  It was more on the front of the skirt rather than on the side, which I prefer.
It's so pretty and comfy! I would buy it again!
It was made really well and it fit great. I have no complaints.

I did receive compliments on this dress when I wore it to work yesterday.  It does have a slit on one side, and honestly, I wish it didn't.  I think it would look better without it.  It isn't really noticeable unless you're sitting down, but when you are sitting down it sits rather high on your thigh which made me a bit anxious wearing it in my business casual workplace.  I suppose it all boils down to personal preference.  Oh, and for reference I'm 5'6 180 pounds 38 D with a mommy tummy.  It does fit nice and is flattering, but the sleeves were short and rode up a lot throughout the day.

I should have snapped a pic but forgot. I will add it once I wear it again.

评论概述: Super pretty, but I'm not sure I love how it hits.
评论详情: Maybe, I'm just not used to it yet. It's hard to find dresses that fit how you want when you have the body of a 6' tall, nearly 200 pound, man. But we press on. The only other option is giving up, and I certainly think not. I didn't wait forty years in the dark, just to put it away again. The dress is Grace Karin. Everything I have ordered for my partner, my daughter, or myself, from them has been of the utmost quality. Love chiffon, of course. The skirt length is just a touch too long for me, but of course, my outrageously long torso is probably to blame. The sleeves and last ten inches of skirt are just the translucent chiffon, black, with gold polka dots. The rest is lined with an opaque black material, that feels wonderful inside. The belt is unsurprisingly high quality, as is the collar button on the back side. I mean, it looks wonderful, and I love everything about it, except I just don't love how it fits, and that's probably more to do with me. Another big win from Grace Karin.

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: X-Large
评论详情: The dress is comfortable and pretty. I would consider this a flashy dress and I normally under the radar so I was a little out of my comfort zone. The quality is good. The cut of the dress didn’t exactly flatter my apple shaped body. I am 5’8” and weight 163 and the extra large fit great.

I expected this dress to be more fun, but there’s a few flaws that won’t allow me to feel so. First, the material is extremely wrinkly. I spent a long time pressing it carefully so that I don’t damage it. This means I can pack it with me when traveling. And the slit on one side is not deep enough to make it more attractive. Other than that, it’s okay.

评论概述: Nice dress, but pulls up easily
类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: Medium
评论详情: This is a polyester dress with an elastic waist and tie to go around the waist as well.  The sleeve cuffs have elastic as well.  There is a slit on the left leg side of the dress,  but not too high of one.  Overall,  it fits well and as expected.  The only reason I took off a star is that the sleeves are either a bit short for me or something causes the whole dress to come up when I lift my arms. If there wasn't elastic around the wrists or waist,  maybe this wouldn't be an issue,  but because of that the whole dress pulls up and then sits up too high after raising my arms,  so I have to readjust a lot if I lift my arms up.  The fabric is typical polyester. The gold spots are shiny and metallic.

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: Large
评论详情: This dress is gorgeous on and the red wine color with the gold dots makes for a fun and stunning combination.  I love that the dress is feminine and flirty with the side slit and ruffle on the skirt, but also looks conservative with its higher neckline and little ruffles on the ends of the sleeves. This dress could be worn to a party, to work, to church or for a holiday dinner - it's one of those really versatile styles. It is lined and is not see thru at all, and the fit is true to size.  I have a 40" bust, ordered a size large based the size chart and the fit is perfect.  Loving this dress.

I got beige dots in medium size- it fits well and flows well on the body! The dots are actually oval and look very good. The dress looks gorgeous and fits well.  It hits at some inches above my ankle and I am 5 feet.  Highly recommended this GK dress!

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: X-Large
评论详情: I got this dress (and another) for a couple upcoming weddings. I tried on both and fell in love with the other dress. This one is a nice dress, but not what I was looking for in a dress for wedding attire. My husband and I both agreed that its more of a Christmas gathering dress. Very nice dress. A little wiggling to get in and out. The fit is perfect. I did get the one in red, but really any of the colors would work for Christmas! I do plan on wearing it for gatherings in December.  The feel is kind of like a really close together lace. It has a nice attached slip that is very comfortable. I have a feeling I will eventually lose the belt that came with, but a nice thin belt or long gold chain would go nice with it, too.

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Beige-gold DotsSize: XX-Large
评论详情: I find myself really liking GRACE KARIN products. This dress is just adorable and a very classic style. It is comfortable and fits as expected. I ordered the lighter color, but honestly, I think I would have loved any of them. The gold spots are noticeable but not super glaring on the lighter color. The dress is lined and has a self-belt. The belt is cute, but I may use a belt of my own since I think that can really make a stronger statement. I'm 5'6, and the dress hit me about the same as it does on the model.
The polka dots are too big and look tacky. Not nearly as flattering as the photo.

类型: Color: Black-gold DotsSize: Small
评论详情: I have received a lot of compliment with this dress.  I have to say gold and black are the perfect match.  The gold leave design pops out every well.  The opening at the leg adds some sexiness to the dress. There is a button on the back to easily take off the dress.  It is not the most soft material, but it goes well with the design of the dress. The bottom part of the dress has two layers, it does not show the under garment at all.

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: Medium
评论详情: This dress is so beautiful! The gold really pops and the fit is great. It's very flattering and I love the slit on the side. I plan to wear this for the holidays and it will be perfect.

类型: Color: Black-gold DotsSize: XX-Large
评论详情: This black dress (by Grace Karin) is accented with oval shaped, gold polka-dots. It is very fetching and feminine. The top does have some detail across the top of the chest. The long sleeves are punctuated with a dainty ruffle at the wrist. It has a belt that adds some shape to the dress. There is a wide layer/ruffle at the hem. There is also a side split, that adds some spice and glamour. The fabric is breathable and comfortable. Overall, you can wear this dress on a number of occasions - from work to play. All you have to do is add some cute jewelry and comfortable shoes. I recommend this dress. 4 stars.

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: X-Large
评论详情: I absolutely love everything I’ve gotten from the Grace Karin brand, and this is no exception!  This dress is beautiful!!  Very high quality and well made. It fits perfectly and is super comfortable.

This dress is so pretty and it fits really well. It has a small thigh slit but it doesn’t really stand out. The dress is light and feels really good. I love the fact that it has a slip like fabric underneath so you cannot see through the dress. Very appropriate for work or church. Very beautiful dress.

类型: Color: Long Sleeve Wine Red-gold DotsSize: X-Large
评论详情: This dress is great for holiday parties. It's flattering and made well. Has good stretch and fits as expected. The belt is what really makes this flattering. It's not thin so the fabric works really well together.

I am very happy with the quality of this dress! When I saw the listing, my first thought was how it reminded me of the dresses that I used to wear in the early 90s! I'm a Gen Xer and still like to wear clothes and accessories from the 80s and 90s. Not only was this dress beautifully tailored, the color was stunning and looks lovely with my red hair! I wear a Juniors Sizes 12 or 14, so the XL was the perfect size for my curvy figure. I love that the belt snatches the waist to create a more slimming effect and it's perfect to wear when you are feeling a bit bloated and want to hide it. You could also wear a waist-cinching belt with this dress, and it's also perfect for autumn weather. I love this dress so much that I want to order it in more colors!
